title: Enyimba want NPFL title as consolation for poor continental outing - Chilekwu
body_text:
Sport
Enyimba want NPFL title as consolation for poor continental outing – Chilekwu
Enyimba midfielder, Chigozie Chilekwu, said the players are aiming to retain the Nigeria Premier Football League title as a consolation for their disappointing display on the continent.
Enyimba failed to progress from the preliminary round of the CAF Champions League.
The Aba giants were also eliminated in the quarter-final stage of the African Football League by Wydad Athletic Club of Morocco.
Chilekwu said the players have put behind them their disappointing exit.
“We are the title holders and want to defend and retain the title after a disappointing outing on the continent,” Chilekwu told DAILY POST.
“We owe our fans that as we are still focused, we have put our past result behind us and looking towards better results in the league.”
Enyimba will take on Niger Tornadoes in a Nigeria Premier Football League matchday six encounter at the Ahmadu Bello Stadium, Kaduna on Wednesday.
